that is the reason why i have made my way to this strange new network. spreading loli and good tidings is my purpose in life and i aim to at least put in a minimum amount of effort.

thank you again for your expressions of gratitude and for following the link! have a pleasant day!

o-okay boss

2_1Hv2SAkcMHkNRHTsdLZ6jg8neGtCZrTEr2.body: a lot of the ideas expressed in this site have no basis in fact or reality and are not very coherently conveyed. no discussion of morality takes place, either, so it really is just a bunch of bad information, some of which i'm convinced the site owner just came up with on his own while he sat in his armchair. he is clearly not well versed in the topic he purports to teach others about. if one is interested to learn more about pedophilia it would be better to just ask a pedophile and dig through the bias.

like i stated, the author does not seem to know what he's talking about. he states things like "Pedophilia as explaind in the definitions section of this page is sexual attraction to prepubescents. This is defiened as a mental disorder." and then goes on to say "Pedophilia in my eyes can be either illegal or legal."


In a first world nation with any semblance of human rights, having a mental disorder, or having a sexual attraction to something simply can't be illegal, so if pedophilia can be "legal or illegal" then it's very difficult to understand what the author thinks pedophilia is.


is it a sexual attraction to children?
is it expressing to other individuals one's sexual attraction to children?
is it the act of an adult having sexual contact with children?
is it the act of viewing possessing child pornography?


without a clear, consistent definition, you can't say whether something is moral or immoral, legal or illegal, right or wrong. without that definition, it's not really possible to have a conversation or a debate about anything.

> [missesrobot](#comment_2_19WW28sn46rz9h15xf6NCELPdzxZ2YhbyB): It shouldn't be illegal to be a pedophile. It should remain illegal for adults to engage in sexual acts with children under 16.

thank you. that's an important distinction to make. i just wish the person purporting to educate others on such a difficult, nuanced subject would take as much care.
